professional_summary: A tech enthusiast with experience in software engineering and data science, specializing in developing end-to-end data science solutions. Proficient in building regression models and user-friendly applications using Python, Flask, and Flet for seamless UI interaction. Skilled in utilizing tools like Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, and Hugging Face Transformers to generate concise and coherent summaries.

education.institution: Acropolis Institute of Technology and Research, Indore
education.degree: Bachelor of TechnologyComputer Science Engineering, Data Science

relevant_projects.title: Student Performance Analysis and Prediction
relevant_projects.about_project: An end-to-end data science solution to analyze the impact of demographic and academic factors on student performance.
work_done: Designed an end-to-end data science solution to analyze the impact of demographic and academic factors on student performance.
Built regression models to predict math scores using features such as gender, race/ethnicity, parental education, and test preparation.
Conducted data cleaning, exploratory data analysis (EDA), and feature engineering; developed a Flask-based frontend to integrate the predictive model.
relevant_projects.technologies_used: Python, Flask, Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib, Seaborn

relevant_projects.title: Text Summarizer Application
relevant_projects.about_project: A user-friendly text summarization application using Flet for seamless UI interaction.
work_done: Developed a user-friendly text summarization application using Flet for seamless UI interaction.
Integrated pre-trained large language models (LLMs) to generate concise and coherent summaries of user-provided text.
Implemented features such as adjustable summary length, multilingual support, and real-time text processing.
relevant_projects.technologies_used: Python, Flet, Hugging Face Transformers, Pandas

relevant_projects.title: Dataset Report Generator
relevant_projects.about_project: An interactive web application to automate dataset analysis and generate comprehensive reports using Streamlit.
work_done: Developed an interactive web application to automate dataset analysis and generate comprehensive reports using Streamlit.
Designed functionality for uploading and processing datasets in multiple formats (e.g., CSV, Excel).
Implemented features such as data preview, summary statistics, visualizations, and missing value analysis for actionable insights.
Integrated dynamic charts and graphs using Matplotlib, Seaborn, and Plotly for better data representation.
Enabled easy report downloads in PDF/CSV format and enhanced usability with a customizable, intuitive UI.
relevant_projects.technologies_used: Python, Streamlit, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Plotly

relevant_projects.title: Data Science and Analytics Club Website
relevant_projects.about_project: A responsive, user-friendly website for the Data Science and Analytics Club to improve online engagement.
work_done: Designed and developed a responsive, user-friendly website for the Data Science and Analytics Club to improve online engagement.
Implemented key features such as event previews, member registration, and an interactive gallery.
Utilized HTML, CSS, Python, Flask, and SQLAlchemy for front-end, back-end, and database development.
